application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: The replacement tree must be planted on or near the existing tree by April 2026; the tree should be of a Hornbeam (Caprinus betulis) that is more suited to the site and of a size not less than 10-12cm girth when planted.

Reason: To ensure the continued amenity provided by the tree(s) and the planting of an appropriate species and in order to preserve the character and appearance of Pendlewood Close. | The tree work specified above must be carried out within 2 years of the date of this decision.

Reason: To ensure the work is only carried out once in respect of this consent and allow Ealing Council the opportunity to reconsider its decision in the light of prevailing circumstances, and reconsult on the case in the event of the consent expiring before implementation.
description:
TPO 608 Ash- Fell to ground level.
TPO 608 Holly- Crown reduce by up to 2.5 metres.
